overview: From 2025-09-12 to 2025-09-13, ethereum-optimism/op-geth had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 7 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Abnormal CPU usage with latest op-geth ( v1.101511.0 )
topIssues.author: cpuchainorg
topIssues.body:
#### System information

Geth version: [v1.101511.0](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/op-geth/releases/tag/v1.101511.0)
CL client & version: e.g. lighthouse/nimbus/prysm@v1.0.0
OS & Version: Ubuntu
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour

CPU usage should be same with the previous version ( [v1.101503.4](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/op-geth/tree/v1.101503.4) )

#### Actual behaviour

It consumes like half of the CPU resources per node, which makes 100% if runs two node. On modern AMD CPU which should have less than 5% of usage in usual

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Observe CPU usage of op-geth after sync finishes

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

When submitting logs: please submit them as text and not screenshots.

topIssues.title: Receipt Correction: Failed to decode RLP receipts ( v1.101602.0 )
topIssues.author: cpuchainorg
topIssues.body:
#### System information

Geth version: v1.101602.0
CL client & version: op-node v1.13.6
OS & Version: Ubuntu host with Docker
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

Network: op-mainnet during full sync

#### Expected behaviour

Should not crash with Receipt Correction error during sync

#### Actual behaviour

```

```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Geth options

```
      --op-network="op-mainnet"
      --rollup.historicalrpc="https://mainnet.optimism.io"
      --rollup.sequencerhttp="https://mainnet-sequencer.optimism.io"
      --rollup.disabletxpoolgossip="true"
      --syncmode="snap"
      --state.scheme="path"
      --history.logs="0"
      --history.transactions="0"
```

op-node options

```
      op-node
      --network="op-mainnet"
      --syncmode="execution-layer"
      --l1.rpckind="standard"
      --l1.trustrpc
```

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

When submitting logs: please submit them as text and not screenshots.
